Create a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the coordinate system. 1. Draw a line from the point 0.0, 0.0 to the point 0.75, 0.0. 2. Draw a line from the point 0.75, 0.0 to the point 0.75, 0.125. 3. Draw a line from the point 0.75, 0.125 to the point 0.0, 0.125. 4. Draw a line from the point 0.0, 0.125 to the point 0.0, 0.0. Close the loop by connecting the last point to the first point. Scale the 2D sketch using a scaling factor of 0.75. Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using euler angles of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 and a translation vector of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0. Extrude the 3D sketch by 0.2 units in the positive direction of the Z-axis. **Part 2: Construct a cylindrical object with a tapered top and a flat bottom.** Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles of 0.0, 0.0, -90.0 and a translation vector of 0.2688, 0.0625, -0.1062. Create a 2D sketch on the X-Z plane of the coordinate system. 1. Draw a circle with a center at the point 0.1062, 0.1062 and a radius of 0.1062. Close the loop by connecting the last point to the first point. Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using euler angles of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 and a translation vector of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0. Extrude the 3D sketch by 0.0625 units in the positive direction of the Y-axis and 0.0625 units in the negative direction of the Y-axis. **Part 3: Construct a cylindrical object with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered middle section.** Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles of 0.0, 0.0, -90.0 and a translation vector of 0.245, 0.0625, -0.13. Create a 2D sketch on the X-Z plane of the coordinate system. 1. Draw a circle with a center at the point 0.13, 0.13 and a radius of 0.13. Close the loop by connecting the last point to the first point. Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using euler angles of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 and a translation vector of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0. Extrude the 3D sketch by 0.0212 units in the positive direction of the Y-axis and 0.0212 units in the negative direction of the Y-axis. **Final Shape:** The final shape is a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. The prism has a flat top and bottom, and the cylindrical hole is centered along the vertical axis of the prism. The dimensions of the prism are approximately 2 units in length, 1 unit in width, and 0.5 units in height. The cylindrical hole has a diameter of approximately 0.5 units.</description>
